entry.sentence: The two brothers had met Schlieben , Karsten and the other victims of Salten 's wife in the bar .

entry.sentence: He could n't shake the feeling that he was being forced to play a ridiculous role in all of this , and that helped him get over the affair more quickly than Magnus had believed .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (S (NP (PRP He)) (VP (MD could) (RB n't) (VP (VB shake) (NP (DT the) (NN feeling)) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD was) (VP (VBG being) (VP (VBN forced) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB play) (NP (DT a) (JJ ridiculous) (NN role)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (DT all)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT this)))))))))))))))) (, ,) (CC and) (S (NP (DT that)) (VP (VBD helped) (SBAR (S (NP (PRP him)) (VP (VBP get) (PP (IN over) (NP (DT the) (NN affair))) (ADVP (ADVP (RBR more) (RB quickly)) (SBAR (IN than) (S (NP (NNP Magnus)) (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN believed))))))))))) (. .)))
